## GetRemoteStoreReturn interface

The current state of a fetch.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface GetRemoteStoreReturn<Result> 
```

## Remarks

This object will correspond to the state for a unique set of arguments, not the whole remote store.

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [error?](./react.getremotestorereturn.error.md) | Error | <i>(Optional)</i> |
|  [fetching](./react.getremotestorereturn.fetching.md) | boolean |  |
|  [result?](./react.getremotestorereturn.result.md) | Result | <i>(Optional)</i> The result of the fetch. Will be <code>undefined</code> if the store has never completed the fetch, or if the fetch has never been initiated. |
